price: Or do they intend a plot [against the Prophet]? But the plot of the disbelievers will rebound against themselves.
arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
